description.displayText: She helped us out in an emergency situation with my elderly mother when my previous home care person suddenly moved away. She was very flexible and agreeable in many ways.  She took initiative and helped organize a lot of my mother's things. She knows how to administer insulin to my mother and take care of her daily needs. I was very happy with her. Unfortunately, she had a different schedule long term, so could only help us out temporarily. She did a really great job overall. Thank you!
